title: Facebook : number of followers of popular beauty brands 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Brand fans in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Brand fans in millions 9.8 is found at Month Bath & Body Works and the minimum is found at Embelleze where Month is 4.01.
The difference of Brand fans in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.79.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Brand fans in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Brand fans in millions 9.8 is found at Month Bath & Body Works and the minimum is found at Embelleze where Month is 4.01.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Brand fans in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Brand fans in millions 9.8 is found at Month Bath & Body Works and the minimum is found at Embelleze where Month is 4.01.
The difference of Brand fans in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.79.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Brand fans in millions in the y axis.
Month Bath & Body Works has the highest Brand fans in millions and Embelleze has the lowest Brand fans in millions.
There is a difference of 5.79 between the maximum Month Bath & Body Works and minimum Month Embelleze.
The Month Bath & Body Works has the highest Brand fans in millions, followed by Risqué, and Mary Kay Brasil. Down to the Month Embelleze which is the lowest.
The Brand fans in millions has reduced over the past 10 Months.
The Month Embelleze has 1.74 times less Brand fans in millions than average.
The Brand fans in millions is 56.38 if we add up values of all Months.
